properties.label: Little Chestnut Bald
properties.description: mountain peak in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on the Swain County, N.C.-Sevier County, Tenn., line near lat. 35°33'54" N., long. 83°38'30" W. Alt. 5,042.

properties.label: Nettle Creek Bald
properties.description: N Swain County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, lat. 35°34'02" N., long. 83°22'55" W. Alt. 5,172.

properties.label: Newton Bald
properties.description: N Swain County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, lat. 35°32'39" N., long. 83°21'32" W. Alt. 5,142.

properties.label: Parson Bald
properties.description: in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on Swain County, N.C.-Blount County, Tenn., line, lat. 35°31'25" N., long. 83°53' W. Alt. 4,730.

properties.label: Potato Hill Bald
properties.description: NE Swain County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on Chiltoskie Ridge near the SE end of Ravens Roost Ridge, lat. 35°35'42" N., long. 83°12'33" W. Alt. 5,209.

properties.label: Silers Bald
properties.description: mountain on the Swain County, N.C.-Sevier County, Tenn., line in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on Welch Ridge near lat. 35°33'58" N., long. 83°33'56" W. Alt. 5,620. Named for Jesse Richardson Siler (1793-1876) of Franklin, who owned the mountain and kept large herds of cattle on it.
